+ Note for Developers

Before running Maavis.iss you need to install the Firefox and Skype installations. See Maavis.iss for details.

Before running MaavisPortable.iss you need to install the FirefoxPortable from portableapps.com into the this folder.  See MaavisPortable.iss for details.

Then copy the folders from vlc to X:/PortableApps/FirefoxPortable/data/plugins:

osdmenu
plugins
and the files:

vlc.exe
vlc.exe.manifest
vlc-cache-gen.exe
npvlc.dll.manifest
npvlc.dll
libvlccore.dll
libvlc.dll
